name: Flail Ramble Boom
description:
The most stunning flail fighting game ever - Ramble Boom.

Become the best fighter and earn money for upgrades

Crush your opponents with different flail-like weapons and share your results with friends.
Choose your personal hero to play for.
Impress your fans and make them scream and clap in joy.
Compete in tournaments with various difficulties.

Have fun with your friends and family playing against each other in 2 player mode.
Enjoy an endless mode and win as many fights as you can.

Features:
- Super fun fighting game
- Simple and very comfortable controls
- Tournament mode with 3 dificulty levels
- Endless fighting mode
- 2 player mode
- Frequent updates
- Wide range of weapons and characters to play for

Be the best fighter - smash all your enemies - make your fans proud of you !!!
